item.title: Americans are getting flashbacks to 2008 as tariffs stoke recession fears

item.title: Amazon and Nvidia say all options are on the table to power AI including fossil fuels
item.description: The tech companies have invested mostly in renewable power, but they are now navigating a changed political environment.

item.title: These four stocks just entered overbought territory and could be due for a drop if volatility persists

item.title: This stock from the CNBC Stock Draft is forming a ‘cup-and-handle’ chart pattern, says Simple Trading’s Danielle Shay
item.description: Now is the time to get bullish on Costco, according to Danielle Shay, vice president of options at Simpler Trading.
